name: Stitched Bud Vase - Small
description:
This stitched porcelain bud vase has been recently added to the Taylor Ceramics line of pillow vases for Fall 2013. 

Inspired by book binding stitches, this collection features a stitched design on a sweet little bud vase. The shape of the vase is rectangular and it's shallow depth make it the perfect accent for a window sill, ledge or small shelf. 

As summer fades to fall these vases look beautiful with a fall clipping of pods or grasses. 

The dimensions are 4 x 3 x 1.5 inches.

name: Beaded Porcelain Cup
description:
Whatever your poison, this porcelain cups fits 8 ounces of any beverage- hot or cold.  Made from a thin porcelain slab it is so light and feels so good to hold!  The glaze is celadon - a transparent glaze with a hint of blue green - and it is so smooth to the touch.  

The size is 3.25 x 4 inches.  If you do not see the color you want available you can contact me to place a special order.  It will take 3-4 weeks to ship.

name: Porcelain Beaded Necklace - Stacks
description:
Hand rolled coils of stained porcelain stacked on top of each other and strung together with with waxed linen creates the look of a little collection around your neck.  

The necklace shown here has navy beads and black linen and ships in 1-3 days.  All other color combinations will take 2-3 weeks, they are made to order.  

The necklace hangs 16" and the beads add another 1.5 "

name: Scallop Pillow Vase - Medium
description:
One of my favorites and best selling items is the pillow vase.  Made from a draped slab of porcelain it makes an elegant, rectangular form with an opening just large enough for a single stem or a few sprigs of something dainty.  It's narrow design make it perfect for a ledge or small shelf. 

This vase in particular has a few colored scallops in the corner but it also comes in a version with no color or you may special order specific colors.  

The measurements for this vase are 4.5" x 5" x 1.5"
The glaze is celadon.

name: Lined Pillow Vase - Medium
description:
These pillow forms are the perfect bud vase to sit on a window sill with a fresh cut sprig from the garden.  They have an organic rectangular shape and are not very deep so they fit into small spaces.  

The medium pillow forms measure approximately 5 inches tall and 5 inches wide with a 1.5-2.5 inch depth.  

This line design is drawn using a charcoal gray glaze pencil and the rest of the vase is in celadon- a glossy glaze with a hint of blue-green.

name: Porcelain Beaded Necklace - Cascading Tears
description:
7 hand formed porcelain beads are crocheted together on waxed linen to make this pendant necklace.  The partially chain crocheted cord hints at tradition on a completely modern pendant piece. 
The linen hangs approximately 16-17 inches and the beads add another 3 inches to the length.  
Wear it to dress up or use it as an everyday adornment but do not wear it in water. 

The white beads with the gray cord is made and ready to ship in 1-3 days.  Choose another color combination and your special order will be made for you and it will ship in 2-3 weeks.

name: Porcelain Beaded Necklace - Cascading Darts
description:
Earthy, rustic and sophisticated describe the Cascading Dart necklace. It's made up of 11 hand cut porcelain beads that are crocheted together with waxed linen.  The cord is chained crocheted part of the way around and secured in the back with a porcelain bead.  The length is approximately 15.5 inches, not including the 3 inch section of beads.  

The white beads on the gray linen is in stock and ships in 1-3 days.  If you would like another color combination you may make your purchase and it will be custom made for you and will ship in 2-3 weeks.

name: Striped Planter - Medium
description:
A wheel thrown porcelain planter - clean, straight edges with a simple line design.  

The color shown on this planter is dark teal and is available now but email me to request any of the other listed colors for a custom planter (3-4 weeks) 

The size is 4.5" x 4 inches.

name: Porcelain Knobs
description:
A beautiful solution to hang a variety of articles:
- a hand towel in your bathroom
- a tote bag and umbrella next to the front door
- necklaces and scarves that otherwise get tangled

Made from wheel thrown porcelain, each knob is different; they measure between 3-5 inches in diameter and come off the wall about 1.5-2.5 inches.  There are two holes for the two screws (included) for easy installment.  

Contact me to special order knobs in a particular size.

name: Scallop Hanging Planter
description:
The scallop hanging planter is made from a wrapped slab of porcelain to form a conical shape. Each one is has a unique organic feel and either a scalloped ridge up the seam or a cluster of scallops at the tip of the cone.  
The planter hangs from organic hemp cord in a natural color. Sliding knots allow for adjustment to the length of the hang which at it's longest is approximately 24 inches. 

The approximate size is 9" x 7" x 5" 
The glaze is celadon - a transparent glossy glaze with a hint of blue-green.

name: Scalloped Porcelain Planter - Small
description:
Little things are so cute and this porcelain planter is no exception. It's perfect for adding a little life to small spaces. This planter is thrown on the potter's wheel and altered at the rim. There is a drainage hole at the bottom that empties into the attached tray. *Each planter has a slightly different scallop detail at the rim. 

The height of a small planer is approximately 3 inches and the width is about 4 inches. 

The glaze is celadon - a transparent glaze with a blue/green tint.

name: Beaded Bud Vase
description:
All it takes to brighten a room sometimes is a single stem in a bud vase. That was the inspiration for this porcelain vase. It's made from a porcelain slab of clay that is wrapped and adorned with a row of hand rolled beads down the seam.  Bead colors are listed below and if the one you want is not in stock you may place a custom order.  This process takes 3-4 weeks.  

It measures approximately 6-7 inches tall and 3-4 inches wide at the base.  The glaze is celadon which is clear and glossy with a hint of blue-green.

name: Beaded Juice Cups
description:
These hand built porcelain tumblers are mini - use them for juice, wine, whiskey, whatever.
Formed from a thin slab they are simple and delicate with a spot of color from the beaded seam. The beauty of these cups is in the weight (they are so light) and 
the feel of the shape in your hand (each one is slightly irregular due to the hand made process).
They stack to conserve on cabinet space or look beautiful displayed on a shelf or counter. 

A cup measures 3. 5 inches tall and 2.5 inches in diameter across the top. 
It holds approximately 6 ounces of liquid and is dishwater and microwave safe.

name: Beaded Mug
description:
These handmade mugs were constructed from very thin slabs of porcelain clay.  Where the wrapped slab overlaps there is a seam and on the outside it is adorned with ceramic beads. The overall glaze is celadon a smooth, translucent glaze with a hint of blue-green.  
This mug is very light and airy and not perfectly round due to the hand building process. 

Width - 3.25 inches (diameter across the top) 
Height - 4 inches
Mug holds approx. 8 ounces of liquid, is microwavable and dishwasher safe.

Color options: 

tangerine
sea foam green
yellow
light blue
navy blue
charcoal gray
light gray

name: Scalloped Porcelain Planter - Medium
description:
A beautiful plant needs a beautiful pot. This planter is thrown on the potter's wheel and altered at the rim. There is a drainage hole at the bottom that empties into the attached tray. 

The height of this planter is 5 inches and 4 inches wide at the rim.

The glaze is celadon - a transparent glaze with a blue/green tint.

*The rim details vary and are not necessarily identical to what is shown in the picture but they are always similar as shown in the picture of three planters. See the size options for slight variations in size.

name: Scallop Vase (2)
description:
This porcelain vase is constructed from a single slab of porcelain and joined together with a decorative "spine" edge. It's perfect for a bouquet of flowers and stands alone as a sculptural vessel.

The glaze is celadon - a glossy, transparent glaze with a hint of blue-green.

The height is 8.25 inches and the width is 4.5 at the widest part.

name: Scallop Vase
description:
This porcelain vase is constructed from a single slab of porcelain and joined together with a decorative scalloped ridge along the spine. It's perfect for a bouquet of flowers and stands alone as a sculptural vessel.

The glaze is celadon - a glossy, transparent glaze with a hint of blue-green.

The height is 9 inches and the width is 3.75 inches at the widest part.
*In the pictures with all three vases in this series, this listing is for the tallest one.

name: Scallop Vase (3)
description:
This porcelain vase is constructed from a single slab of porcelain and joined together with a decorative "spine" edge.  It's perfect for a bouquet of flowers and stands alone as a sculptural vessel.  

The glaze is celadon - a glossy, transparent glaze with a hint of blue-green.  

The height is 7.5 inches and the width is 3 at the widest part.

name: Tinted Porcelain Tumbler- small
description:
I am loving this new colored clay... the only tricky part is naming the color! It's sort of a warm, gray-ish, purple-y brown to put it not so elegantly.  Where the wrapped slab overlaps there is a coil of contrasting yellow clay.  The whole piece is glazed in clear and has a glossy finish.  
While it is very light and thin and seemingly fragile, it can be put in the dishwasher and microwave.  
The piece measures 3.25 inches across the top, is 4 inches tall and holds approximately 8 ounces of liquid.

name: Beaded Porcelain Tumbler
description:
These tumblers are constructed from very thin slabs of porcelain clay. Where the wrapped slabs overlap there is a seam and on the outside it is adorned with a line of ceramic beads. The overall glaze is celadon- a smooth, translucent glaze with a hint of blue-green. 
Each cup has a little variation and they are not perfectly round due to the hand building process. 

Width - 3 inches across the top
Height - 5.5 inches

Cups are microwavable and dishwasher safe.

name: Porcelain Bud Vase
description:
Simple and elegant... to show off a fresh cut flower...
This porcelain vase has clean lines and minimal detail.  A porcelain slab was wrapped together and glazed in celadon - a clear and glossy glaze with a hint of blue-green.  
The vase measures approximately 6 inches tall and about 4.5 inches at the widest part of the base.

name: Scallop Bud Vase
description:
This vase was created with the elegance and simplicity of a fresh cut flower in mind.  It is made from a porcelain slab of clay and adorned with a ridged spine. 

It measures 6.25 inches tall and 3.75 inches wide at the base.  The glaze is celadon which is clear and glossy with a hint of blue-green.

name: Options for bead and stripe colors
description: This posting shows the color options for the beads and stripes.  Many are in stock on most items and others can be special ordered.  A custom order takes 3-4 weeks.
